name: Fulfilling dreams
description:
If you ask yourself what is my dream. Can I answer right away? And if not, then I have no dreams. And if there is no dream, then I do not need anything.

And so, the most important thing in my life is to solve problems. I will look for opportunities to escape. Instead of noticing opportunities to get.

Is it a game or maybe an app. Harm a specialized notebook with some statistics. In it, you can describe your own dream and the opportunities that will help realize this dream.

If you manage to reach the end, you will be pleasantly surprised.

You will love it.

Or not, it all depends on you.
